VEvil.​FE.​Gameplay.​Health.​HealthModuleDisplayerSettings
[Serializable]
public struct
VEvil.​FE.​Gameplay.​Health.​HealthModuleDisplayerSettings

The settings used by a HealthModuleDisplayer.

Properties

set
}

Should the HealthModuleDisplayer hide its containers over a certain amount of time if no damage has been detected on the target AHealthModule ?

TimeToHide
[field: SerializeField, Tooltip("The time to hide the containers of the HealthModuleDisplayer.\nTime in seconds!\nHideOverTime must be true.")]
public float TimeToHide {

set
}

The time to hide the containers of the HealthModuleDisplayer.

Time in seconds.  HideOverTime must be true.

The smoothing value that'll be applied to the filler bar to make things look a bit more fancy.
